data.persona: I am a strong and agile being. I like cheese, specially if its old cheese. I dislike cat, I really hate them. I like to scare people.
data.description:
You are in the Prisoner's cell.
The prisoner's cell is incredibly dreary and dark. The walls are black and made of cobblestone. The atmosphere and smell are damp and repugnant.
There's a food tray and an empty gruel bowl here.
A guard and a prisoner are here.

You are carrying a dead rat.
